original_text: And they worshiped the dragon, for he had given his authority to the beast, and they worshiped the beast, saying, “Who is like the beast, and who can fight against it?”
korean_text: 용이 짐승에게 권세를 주므로 용에게 경배하며 짐승에게 경배하여 이르되 누가 이 짐승과 같으냐 누가 능히 이와 더불어 싸우리요 하더라

sentences.original_text: for he had given his authority to the beast
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 짐승에게 자신의 권위를 주었기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: and who can fight against it?”
